Phobias computer records everything it hears, without instructions 
from the spider it won't relay the message back to him.

Phobias ship lands where Kluster instructed, there were no signs of 
activity outside the base so the Predacons either didn't hear, or 
didn't accept his invitation. Again the loading ramp opens. Phobia 
steps to the back of the ship."Computer slide forward crates E- 5 
through 10." the crates slid out of their designated locations and 
took position on a conveyor to unload. "Alright Kluster lets get to 
work."

If you've reversed the babies you can't hear outside the ship.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     "Yes, I was just talking to Unicron, that would account for my 
change of 
> body,"  Magmatron explained. Magmatron looked past Shredder to the 
far wall. 
> He walked over and seemingly started to talk to the wall.
>     "Hello, Phobia. Guess who's back." Magmatron said to one of the 
spider 
> bots climbing the wall. He turned back to Shredder and once again 
walked to 
> him, his wings flowing behind him like a dark knights cape. (Batman 
reference)
